images.name: Green_Julian 140707 [1296x729]
images.caption: Klinsmann is uniquely suited to tapping the world for talent, including the likes of Julian Green.

images.name: Play of the day: Julian Green
images.caption: United States forward Julian Green struck gold with his first ever touch in a World Cup game, a stunning volley to get the U.S. back in the game against Belgium.

video.headline: Play of the day: Julian Green
video.description: United States forward Julian Green struck gold with his first ever touch in a World Cup game, a stunning volley to get the U.S. back in the game against Belgium.
video.title: Play of the day: Julian Green

video.headline: Can Ronaldo share the spotlight again?

video.headline: Beckham backs Rodriguez as Real deal
video.description: David Beckham visited Real Madrid's training camp in the United States to congratulate them on la decima, and backed James Rodriguez as a great signing.
video.title: Beckham backs Rodriguez as Real deal

video.headline: WATCH: Bale scores beauty against Inter
video.description: Real Madrid star Gareth Bale scored a marvellous long-distance goal in their 1-1 draw with Inter in the International Champions Cup in California.

video.headline: Ancelotti predicts big season for Bale
video.description: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti is predicting big things for Gareth Bale ahead of the upcoming campaign after the Welsman's wonder goal against Inter Milan in pre-season.

video.headline: No ill-feelings over Brazil snub - Kaka
